justification: Offer ignores Team B’s clear injury aversion by sending an IR QB for a healthy Tier 2 RB. Rationale is A-centric and even incorrect (“three starting QBs” when one is IR), showing little regard for B’s incentives or consensus-driven mindset. While B likely needs a QB, the proposal doesn’t address that they’d want a healthy, reliable option. Explanation is generic and not grounded in profiles.
